About Me

Let me tell you few things about me...

BIO

My name is Chukwu ( Chijioke ) Peter, a tech enthusiast and Software Engineer. I have explored years of experience working in software solution companies, I have been able to integrate and building Full-stack solutions for clients; I am a life long learner, researcher and I am currently a postgraduate student of the University of Technology Owerri, Imo state Nigeria. I have worked with several programming and scripting languages,which are but not limited to: kotlin, PHP , Java, C++, Google Go, JavaScript, Python. I am proficient in the use of Mobile Technologies (React-Native, Jetpack Compose, Flutter), Backend Technologies(Laravel, Gin, Django) and also Front end web Technologies(React, JQuery,Bootstrap) etc. I have also used some cloude services such as Google ,Heroku, AWS. I'm a life long learner and researching in the area of software engineering and mobile computing. I am currently working @jatado Tech as a senior Software Solutions Engineer. My goal is to be a better version of my self every day and also make positive contribution that brings growth wherever I find myself.
